CustomField.description: Manages stock control: Controlled by Quantity (Exact Reward number must be entered in "Available Stock Quantity"); Controlled by Item (a defined file - .CSV, .txt - or list is uploaded containing specific Reward codes, each representing a Reward item); Unlimited (no control required; Reward can be redeemed unlimited times).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose how to manage the Reward stock: Controlled by Quantity, Controlled by Item (a list containing specific Reward codes, each representing a Reward item) or Unlimited.
CustomField.label: Stock Type
